nodes.text: The Rbollea system was located in the Interior Region, an area of the Hapes Cluster in the Slice portion of the Inner Rim. It was connected via hyperlane to the Tinta system. The Rbollea system was the origin point of the substance known as Rbollean petal-oil.
The Rbollea system was introduced in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-9.
